node.name: Cobra Javelin Gen2+ Night Vision Scope
node.short_description: The Cobra Javelin Gen2+ Night Vision Scope is a scope that is suitable not only for Air Rifle use but also for centrefire and rimfire rifles alike
node.description:
The Cobra Javelin Gen2+ Night Vision Scope is a scope that is suitable not only for Air Rifle use but also for centrefire and rimfire rifles alike. This night vision scope is a fine example of the capabilities that this grade of equipment is capable of.

Cobra Javelin Gen2+ Night Vision Scope

Dimensions H: 7.5cm x L: 8.5cm x D: 33cm
Weight 900 g
Classification Gen 2+
Magnification 4 x
Objective Lens Diameter 66 mm
Infrared Illuminator Yes
Battery Type 2 x AA

node.name: Hawke Airmax 30 Compact 3-12x40 AMX IR Rifle Scope
node.short_description: The Hawke Airmax 30 Compact 3-12×40 AMX IR Rifle Scope, designed especially for air rifle use, featuring the new AMX reticle and offers side focus down to 10 yards.
node.description:
The Hawke Airmax 30 Compact 3-12x40 AMX IR Rifle Scope, designed especially for air rifle use, featuring the new AMX reticle and offers side focus down to 10 yards.

Hawke Airmax 30 Compact 3-12x40 AMX IR Rifle Scope Features:

Wide Angle optical system ideal for varmint/airgun
Lightweight and compact construction – short eye relief
16 layer fully multi-coated optics for exceptional clarity
Side focus control for parallax adjustment to infinity
30mm mono-tube chassis for superior strength
Glass etched reticle with red illumination
6 levels of brightness with off positions in-between
1⁄10 MRAD capped, resettable target turrets
Fast focus eyebell and high torque zoom ring

node.name: Hawke Airmax 30 SF 3-12x50 Rifle Scope
node.short_description: The Hawke Airmax 30 SF 3-12×50 Rifle Scope has been designed with the Air Rifle shooter in mind, helping you to achieve accurate pellet trajectories whether shooting targets or hunting.
node.description:
The Hawke Airmax 30 SF 3-12x50 Rifle Scope has been designed with the Air Rifle shooter in mind, helping you to achieve accurate pellet trajectories whether shooting targets or hunting. Featuring side focus control, the AMX reticle and infinitely adjustable infra-red illumination.

Hawke Airmax 30 SF 3-12x50 Rifle Scope Features

16 layer fully multi-coated optics for exceptional clarity
Side focus control for parallax adjustment to infinity
30mm mono-tube chassis for superior strength
Glass etched reticle with red illumination
Stepless rheostat offers total brightness control
¼ MOA exposed, locking and resettable turrets
Fast focus eyebell and high torque zoom ring

node.name: Night Master IC 400 IR Illuminator
node.short_description: The Night Master IC 400 IR Illuminator features intensity control technology allowing you to quickly adjust the brightness of the beam for spotting, identifying and shooting your quarry, whether it’s rats, rabbits or foxes.
node.description:
The Night Master IC 400 IR Illuminator features intensity control technology allowing you to quickly adjust the brightness of the beam for spotting, identifying and shooting your quarry, whether it’s rats, rabbits or foxes.

Night Master’s custom-made LED module is built into the neck section and works with the rotary tail switch to dim and brighten the intensity of the beam. Twist it left to reduce brightness and right to increase it. Having this level of control means that you can put out just enough light. If you do white-out your target, simply reduce the brightness until you get a good image through the scope. LEDs are changeable, as is the head, to give you ultimate control.

Night Master IC 400 IR Illuminator Features

LED: High power LED with brightness control function
Battery: 1 or 2 x 18650, 2 x CR123A
Function: Twist the rotary tail switch left to reduce brightness and right to increase it.
Switch: Protruding foward clicky tail switch. The switch has a glow-in-the-dark (GITD) cover for easy identification at night.
Protection: Sealed with O-rings for excellent water resistance and improved service life. Waterproof and Dust Resistant to IPX-8.
Dimension: ﻿Length: 153mm, Body: 25mm
Weight: ﻿215g
Finish: Rugged body with HA Type III anodising.
Lens: Specially designed convex lens for maximum beam throw and adjustability - the beam can be focused to your shooting requirements.

node.name: Pard NV008 Digital Night Vision Rifle Scope
node.short_description: The Pard NV008 Digital Night Vision Rifle Scope is a superb performer, up to 200m both day & night. Use as a handheld spotter or as a dedicated rifle scope.
node.description:
The performance of the PARD NV008 Digital Night Vision Rifle Scope is superb. The NV008 can be used as an individual handheld spotter or as a dedicated rifle scope thanks to its detachable Weaver/Picatinny scope mount.

The NV008 has been designed as a night & day rifle scope combo unit. This scope provides the user with excellent performance to 200 meters with the onboard IR illuminator. If paired with a higher grade IR / Laser illuminator performance can be increased to 250 meters, dependant upon external conditions.

 

 

Pard NV008 Digital Night Vision Rifle Scope Features:

Professional night vision , not need to add on other scope.
Smart, Compact and light-weighted with ergonomic design.
IP67 waterproof-rated protection ensures our device performs perfectly in wet weather.
Long range viewing up to 200 meters.
Easy to use and operate, esp.for a new beginner.
Day light & Nighttime mode, can be used anytime even in complete darkness.
Build in picatinny, you can add illuminator or laser according to your needs.

node.name: Pard NV008 LRF Digital Night Vision Rifle Scope
node.short_description: The Pard NV008 LRF is a Digital, Night Vision, Rifle Scope that sets the benchmark in value and performance for money.
node.description:
The Pard NV008 LRF is a Digital, Night Vision, Rifle Scope that sets the benchmark in value and performance for money. With 1080p for both daytime and night-time viewing, MP4 video recording, fast change battery power, and a compact powerful illuminator.

The Pard NV008 LRF is supplied with a weaver rail mount to fit your rifle, the unit comes with a choice of reticles and is ideal for daytime vermin or stalking shots with the ability to switch to night mode with HD image quality when needed.

Pard NV008 LRF Digital Rifle Scope Features:

1080P Full colour for daytime use
1080P Night vision mode for night use
600M inbuilt laser rangefinder
6.5x optical magnification and digital 15x zoom function, increases image size target image size.
Built in 150yd-200yd illuminator with zoom function from spot to flood and three IR power modes
Built in laser, useful for using as a marker for rangefinding
Recoil rated upto .308 calibre
6.5 Optical 13x Digital Magnification
Picture in Picture upto 26x

node.name: Pulsar Quantum Lite XQ23V Thermal Imaging Scope
node.short_description: The Pulsar Quantum Lite XQ23V Thermal Imaging Scope offers unmatched performance at its price point.
node.description:
The Pulsar Quantum Lite XQ23V Thermal Imaging Scope has all the features found on the previous Quantum XQ Series but has a new objective lens. The Quantum Lite now offers unmatched performance at its price point.

Operating at a frame rate of 50Hz and using a 384x288 17µm thermal sensor, the Quantum Lite produces a smooth, detailed image.

Pulsar Quantum Lite XQ23V Thermal Imaging Scope Features:

High Frame Rate
Stadiametric Rangefinder
Wide Temperature Range
Display-off Mode
Long Detection Range
7 Colour Palettes
Two Second Start-Up Time
Three Calibration Modes
Three Operating Modes
Video Out Port
Weaver Accessory Rail
Power Saving Modes
Frost-Resistant AMOLED display
